div.div:
Legend:
━━━ XLR Audio Cable
━━━ TS/TRS Instrument Cable
━━━ XLR Speaker Cable
━━━ Power Cable
- - - WiFi Connection

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 178px; height: 1px; padding-top: 707px; margin-left: 251px;

div.div:
Phase 1 Equipment:
• 2x AT875R Shotgun Mics
• 1x SM57 Pit Mic
• 3x Radial Pro DI Boxes
• 1x XR18 Digital Mixer
• 1x QSC K12.2 Speaker
• 1x Tablet (WiFi Control)
• Cables & Power
